refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate a table with values from a quadratic Bézier function.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This subroutine creates an ftable from segments constructed by paths traced by the quadratic Bézier function.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: f # time size "quadbezier" y1 cx1 cy1 x2 y2 [cx2 cy2 x3 y3 ...]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: x2, x3, etc. -- Locations in table at which to attain the following y value. Must be in increasing order. It is assumed that x1 equals 0. If the last value is less than size, then the rest will be set to zero. Should not be negative.
y1, y2, y3, etc. -- Breakpoint values attained at the location specified by the preceding x value.

cx1, cx2, cx3, etc. -- Virtual x coordinates for the different control points. cx[n] can be equal to but not less than x[n] and equal to but not greater than x[n+1]. Should not be negative but can be zero.
cy1, cy2, cy3, etc. -- Virtual y coordinates for the different control points.
